title: What is the fix for Google pixel XL usb gigabit ethernet is not recognized or working?
content: Hi all, just purchased a USB ethernet adapter for my google pixel xl but the phone doesnâ€™t recognize the adapter. I know in the past this feature works. I am just going to use it for internet hardwire speeds thru Cat5 for my work. But this android phone makes it difficult to setup, Samsung phones works w/ it but how cone google changed this feature or removed it? Any fix or advice what to do? The setup is USB network adapter is male & connected to the USB-C female that comes w/ the phone.
